renderpass.code:
#define rot(a)    mat2( cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)) )           // rotation                  
#define C(a,l,L)  max(  length((a).xy) -l, abs(a).z -L )   // cylinder


void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {
    
    float t=9., a,b;
    vec3  R = iResolution, M = iMouse.xyz,
          D = normalize(vec3( U+U, -3.*R.y ) - R ),      // ray direction
          p = 50./R, q;                                  // marching point along ray 
    
    for ( O-=O ; O.x < 1. && t > .01 ; O+=.02 )
        q = p, t=9.,
        q.yz *= rot(.8 + 2. *M.y),                       // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(   - 6.3*M.x),
        q = q.xzy,
        t = max( -C( q, 9.,11.), C( q, 10.,10.)),        // mug
        t = min(t, a = C( q, 9.,8.)),                    // liquid
        t = min(t, b = length(q-=vec3(3.*cos(.5*iTime+vec2(0,11)),7.5)) -2. ), // eye
        p += t*D;                                        // step forward = dist to obj          

   if (a==t && O.x<1.) O = vec4(2,0,0,0);                // coloring
   if (b==t && O.x<1.) q.xz *= rot(.5*sin(iTime)), O = vec4(C(q,.0,2.));
}
renderpass.name: Image
